dmca.title: Web Site Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: David H. Kaplan [mailto:dhkaplan@comcast.net] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 11, 2006 9:43 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Web Site Copyright Infringement
Subject: Web Site Copyright Infringement



As requested in your previous email, I am attaching a letter that
fulfills your request to comply with the notification elements of the
DCMA of 1998.

 

I look forward to your speedy attention to this matter.

 

Thank you for your assistance.

 

David H. Kaplan
